headline: How Embedding Origin AI’s WiFi Sensing In NXP’s Chipsets (NXPI) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In January 2026, Origin AI announced a collaboration with NXP Semiconductors to embed its WiFi Sensing software into NXP’s i.MX 9 applications processors and wireless tri-radio chipsets, aiming to accelerate motion-sensing features in smart home devices. By integrating sensing capabilities directly at the chipset level, the partnership could simplify hardware designs and shorten development timelines for future smart home products. We’ll now examine how this embedded WiFi sensing push...
